pages.text: "A fairly advanced machine used to compress osmium into various dusts in order to create their ingot counterparts."$(p)The Osmium Compressor is what you would use to craft more advanced ingots using their dust counterparts. It uses Liquid Osmium as fuel. Each osmium ingot provides 200mB of

Liquid Osmium, and an Osmium Block would provide 1,800mB of Liquid Osmium. $(p)$(bold)Supported Upgrades:$()$(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_speed)Speed Upgrades$(/l) (8) $(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_energy)Energy Upgrades$(/l) (8) $(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_muffling)Muffling Upgrades$(/l) (4)
